ActJudges Act
SubjectLeave of absence to the Hon. Johanne N. Morissette
PrecisGranting of a leave of absence to the Hon. JOHANNE N. MORISSETTE, a Judge of the Superior Court of Justice in and for the Province of Ontario from March 2, 2014 to August 31, 2014, on account of ill-health.
AttachmentsAttachment
